summary: Summarize, count, find max/min, etc. across items based on specified fields

parameters.name: fields to summarize
parameters.description: Specify the fields and aggregation methods to summarize the data. You can choose from options like count, sum, average, max, min, etc.

parameters.name: fields to split by
parameters.description: Specify the fields by which you want to split the summary data.

parameters.name: fields to group by
parameters.description: Specify the fields by which you want to group the summary data.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options to customize the summarization process, such as handling missing fields, output format, etc.
